entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
